flawed_nl_solution:
Last week, Arman earned 35 hours x $10/hour = $<<35*10=530>>530.
This week, Arman could earn 40 hours x $10.5/hour = $<<40*10.5=420>>420.
So, he will receive $530 + $420 = $<<530+420=950>>950 for working two weeks.
#### 950

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 350, not 530. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
